item.title: Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast - Delicious Family Favorite
item.description: Indulge in this Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast that promises to impress your family at dinner. Its rich flavors and tender texture make it a standout dish. Try it tonight and elevate your mealtime experience!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breast
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • 1 teaspoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
  3. Coat the chicken breasts with the mixture and place them in a baking dish.
  4. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top of the chicken.
  5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and golden brown.
  6. Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

item.title: Healthy Stuffed Chicken for Family
item.description: This roasted red pepper, spinach, and mozzarella stuffed chicken is a healthy delight! Packed with flavor and nutrition, it's perfect for weeknight dinners. Try it tonight and impress your family!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: 60 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 chicken breasts
  • 1 cup fresh spinach, chopped
  • 1/2 cup roasted red peppers, diced
  • 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix the spinach, roasted red peppers, and mozzarella cheese.
  3. Cut a pocket in each chicken breast and stuff with the spinach mixture.
  4. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then drizzle with olive oil.
  5. Place the stuffed chicken in a baking dish and bake for 30-35 minutes until cooked through.

item.title: Melt-In-Your-Mouth Chicken for Busy Families
item.description: This melt-in-your-mouth chicken is a weeknight lifesaver! Juicy, tender, and bursting with flavor, it's a dish the whole family will adore. Try it tonight for a quick and delicious dinner!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 25 minutes

â° Total Time: 40 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 chicken breasts
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • 1 teaspoon dried rosemary
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
  2. Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic, thyme, and rosemary.
  3. Add chicken to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes on each side until golden brown and cooked through.

item.title: Brown Sugar Pineapple Chicken: Sweet Savory Delight for Family
item.description: This Brown Sugar Pineapple Chicken is a delightful blend of sweet and savory flavors that your family will love. The caramelized sauce elevates the dish, making it perfect for weeknight dinners. Try this easy recipe tonight!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 25 minutes

â° Total Time: 40 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breasts, diced
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1 cup pineapple chunks
  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon garlic, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
  2. Add diced chicken and season with salt and pepper. Cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
  3. In a bowl, mix brown sugar, soy sauce, garlic, and pineapple chunks.
  4. Pour the sauce over the chicken and simmer for 15 minutes until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce thickens.

item.title: Crispy Sweet Spicy Chicken for Family
item.description: This Baked Crunchy Hot Honey Chicken is a delightful blend of crispy texture and sweet-spicy flavor. It's a healthier alternative to fried chicken that the whole family will love. Try it tonight for a satisfying meal!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 35 minutes

â° Total Time: 50 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken pieces
  • 1 cup breadcrumbs
  • 1/2 cup hot honey
  • 1 teaspoon paprika
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix breadcrumbs, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
  3. Coat chicken pieces with olive oil, then dredge in the breadcrumb mixture.
  4. Place the coated chicken on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes until golden and crispy.
  5. Drizzle hot honey over the chicken before serving.

item.title: Easy Chicken Enchiladas for Family Fun
item.description: These Easy Homemade Chicken Enchiladas are a family favorite that combines convenience with delicious flavors. With succulent chicken and rich melted cheese, they are sure to please everyone at the table. Try making them for your next family dinner!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound cooked chicken, shredded
  • 1 cup enchilada sauce
  • 2 cups shredded cheese
  • 8 corn tortillas
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • Salt to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add shredded chicken, cumin, chili powder, and salt. Stir until heated through.
  3. Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet until pliable.
  4. Spoon the chicken mixture into each tortilla, roll them up, and place seam-side down in a baking dish.
  5. Pour enchilada sauce over the rolled tortillas and sprinkle with cheese.
  6. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly.

item.title: Crispy Baked Chicken Thighs Every Time
item.description: Indulge in the irresistible crunch of perfectly baked chicken thighs that are juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. This recipe is a game-changer for weeknight dinners, offering a delightful blend of flavors that will leave everyone asking for seconds.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 chicken thighs, bone-in and skin-on
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 425Â°F (220Â°C).
  2. Pat the chicken thighs dry with paper towels and place them in a large bowl.
  3. Drizzle olive oil over the chicken and season with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat evenly.
  4. Arrange the chicken thighs skin-side up on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
  5. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the skin is crispy and the internal temperature reaches 165Â°F (75Â°C).
  6. Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

item.title: Sticky Apple Cider Chicken Thighs
item.description: Indulge in the comforting flavors of fall with these Sticky Apple Cider Chicken Thighs. Tender chicken thighs are glazed with a sweet and tangy apple cider reduction, making this dish a perfect centerpiece for your next family dinner or cozy gathering.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 chicken thighs, bone-in and skin-on
  • 1 cup apple cider
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 2 tablespoons brown sugar
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1 teaspoon thyme

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
  2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
  3. Season the chicken thighs with salt and pepper, then add them to the skillet, skin-side down.
  4. Sear the chicken for about 5-7 minutes until the skin is golden brown.
  5. Flip the chicken and pour in the apple cider and brown sugar.
  6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then transfer the skillet to the preheated oven.
  7. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
  8. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with thyme before serving.

item.title: Sticky Apple Cider Chicken
item.description: This Sticky Apple Cider Chicken is a delightful fall dish that combines the sweetness of apple cider with savory chicken, creating a mouthwatering experience. Perfect for cozy dinners, this recipe will warm your heart and home.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 chicken thighs, bone-in and skin-on
  • 1 cup apple cider
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh thyme for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
  2. In a large oven-safe skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
  3. Season the chicken thighs with salt and pepper, then add them to the skillet, skin-side down.
  4. Sear the chicken for about 5-7 minutes until the skin is golden brown.
  5. Flip the chicken and add apple cider and Dijon mustard to the skillet.
  6. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
  7. Remove from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving, garnished with fresh thyme.

item.title: Ultimate Quick and Easy Chicken Enchiladas
item.description: These Ultimate Quick and Easy Chicken Enchiladas are a delightful blend of tender chicken, gooey cheese, and zesty sauce, making them perfect for any dinner occasion. Ready in just 45 minutes, they are a healthy and satisfying meal that your family will love!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups shredded cooked chicken
  • 1 cup enchilada sauce
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 8 corn tortillas
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add shredded chicken, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Stir until heated through.
  3. Spread a thin layer of enchilada sauce on the bottom of a baking dish.
  4. Fill each tortilla with the chicken mixture and a sprinkle of cheese, then roll them up and place seam-side down in the baking dish.
  5. Pour the remaining enchilada sauce over the top and sprinkle with the remaining cheese.
  6. Bake for 20-25 minutes until the cheese is bubbly and golden.

item.title: Irresistibly Easy Cowboy Butter Chicken Linguine
item.description: This Cowboy Butter Chicken Linguine is a delightful fusion of flavors that comes together in just 30 minutes. Perfectly cooked chicken is enveloped in a rich, buttery sauce that clings to the pasta, making every bite a comforting experience.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breast, diced
  • 2 tablespoons cowboy butter
  • 8 ounces linguine
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook linguine according to package instructions until al dente, then drain.
  2. In a large skillet, melt cowboy butter over medium heat.
  3. Add diced chicken, season with salt and pepper, and cook until golden brown and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes.
  4. Toss the cooked linguine with the chicken and butter sauce until well coated.
  5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

item.title: Chili Colorado
item.description: Experience the rich and vibrant flavors of traditional Mexican Chili Colorado, a hearty dish that brings warmth and comfort to any table. This slow-cooked delight features tender beef simmered in a luscious red chili sauce, perfect for sharing with family and friends.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 25 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 40 minutes

â° Total Time: 65 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 6 ancho chili peppers, stemmed and seeded
  • 6 guajillo peppers, stemmed and seeded
  • 2 pasilla peppers, stemmed and seeded
  • 3 chiles de arbol, stemmed and seeded
  • 1 tablespoon Mexican oregano
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 small onion, chopped
  • 2 jalapeno peppers, chopped (optional)
  • 4-5 cloves garlic, chopped
  • 2.5 pounds beef chuck roast, cut into bite-sized chunks
  • Â¼ cup flour
  • 2 cups beef stock
  • Crumbly white cheese, fresh herbs, spicy chili flakes, lime juice for serving
  • Rice and/or warmed tortillas for serving

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Make the sauce first by dry toasting the dried peppers in a pan for about a minute per side, until the skins blister a bit. Set them into a bowl and cover with hot water for 20 minutes, until they are very soft.
  2. Transfer the peppers to a blender with oregano, cumin, a bit of salt and pepper, and 1 cup of the soaking water. Blend until nice and smooth. Strain the sauce and set aside.
  3. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Toss the cubed chuck roast in the flour with a bit of salt and pepper to coat them. Brown the beef on all sides, about 5 minutes. Remove to a plate and set aside.
  4. Reduce the heat to medium. Add the onion and peppers and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring occasionally.
  5. Add the red chili sauce and stock to the pot and bring to a boil. Add the browned meat back to the pot. Reduce the heat, cover, and simmer for at least 30 minutes to let the flavors develop. For melt-in-your-mouth tender beef, simmer for 2 hours or more.
  6. If youâ€™d like to thicken the chili, remove the cover and increase the heat. Cook until the moisture cooks out and your preferred thickness is achieved.

ğŸ“Œ Pinterest Tags: #cat1761229889885 #mediumrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #ancho #guajillo #pasilla

ğŸ“Œ Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Herb Roasted Chicken with Vegetables
item.description: This Herb Roasted Chicken with Vegetables is a comforting dish that fills your home with delightful aromas. Perfectly seasoned and beautifully roasted, it's a meal that brings family together around the table.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 75 minutes

â° Total Time: 90 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 whole chicken (3.3 lbs)
  • 2 carrots, chopped
  • 2 potatoes, chopped
  • 1 onion, quartered
  • 2 sprigs thyme
  • 2 sprigs rosemary
  • 1 lemon, halved
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 200Â°C (400Â°F).
  2. Season the chicken inside and out with thyme, rosemary, and lemon juice.
  3. Place the chopped vegetables around the chicken in a roasting pan.
  4. Drizzle olive oil over the chicken and vegetables.
  5. Roast in the preheated oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until the chicken is golden brown and juices run clear.

item.title: Classic Fried Chicken
item.description: This Classic Fried Chicken is a crispy, golden delight that brings comfort and joy to any meal. Perfectly seasoned and fried to perfection, it's a dish that will have everyone coming back for seconds.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 120 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: 135 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 8 chicken pieces (drumsticks, thighs, breasts)
  • 2 cups buttermilk
  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 2 tsp paprika
  • 2 tsp garlic powder
  • 2 tsp salt
  • 2 tsp black pepper
  • Vegetable oil for frying

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Marinate chicken in buttermilk for at least 2 hours.
  2. In a bowl, mix flour with paprika, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
  3. Remove chicken from buttermilk and dredge in the seasoned flour until well coated.
  4. Heat vegetable oil in a deep fryer or large skillet to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  5. Deep fry chicken pieces for 12-15 minutes until golden brown and cooked through.
  6. Drain on paper towels and serve hot.
